author: Staff Reporter
text:
A free one-day training programme on ‘desi bird farming’ will be held at the Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Veterinary College and Research Institute premises on Mohanur Road on March 29.

A press release from N. Akila, Senior Scientist and Head, said that the programme would also deal with the feeding methods.

Also, training programme on ‘Vermicompost preparation techniques’ will be held on March 28. For registration one can visit the KVK in person or register through phone: 04286-266345 and 266650.

Only 30 persons can participate in the training programme and registration is mandatory.
title: Training programme in desi bird farming
